short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Desktop Notification extension for 3DSWYM community, specific to DSSwYm and 3DSwYm communities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
User is notified with latest available Post and IQuestion from 3DSwYm Community site.
V 1.9: Forgot to reset the timer to production mode. And hence minor change.
V 1.8: Bug fix authentication issue.
V 1.7: Bug in previous version fixed. i.e.Extra enhancement code commented. 
V 1.6: Bug fix. 401 error handling
V 1.5: Bug fixes
V 1.4: web service information handling against RSS feed information.
